source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a computer-generated animation showing a high-angle, wide view of an airport at night. The runways and taxiways are illuminated with glowing lines and dots, and a central terminal building is also lit up. A text overlay in the center of the screen reads "July 7, 2017." The camera remains static throughout the clip.
